<p>Setting up an event is a lot of work â€” and then you need to get attendees there! </p><p>Based on user requests, event organizers can now send out email invitations to events directly from EVENTS by Unlock Labs.</p><p>Simply put in the email addresses of the prospective attendees...</p><img src="/images/blog/unlock-labs-feature-announcement--invite-by-email/a457194ca90d67c1497389dfbc761bc0.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="904" nextwidth="1650" class="image-node embed"><p>...and confirm the send.</p><img src="/images/blog/unlock-labs-feature-announcement--invite-by-email/294537e13776a9f09491bd9849ed8436.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="680" nextwidth="1332" class="image-node embed"><p>Easy!</p>
